snippet: A person briefed on the case said a former executive at KPMG gave insider tips to a golfing buddy in exchange for cash and gifts.
abstract: A person briefed on the case said a former executive at KPMG gave insider tips to a golfing buddy in exchange for cash and gifts.

headline.main: Tips Traded on Golf Course Led to KPMG Executive's Downfall
headline.print_headline: Tips Traded on a Golf Course Led to the Downfall of a Top KPMG Executive
